questions.question: Are there two individuals seated at a desk working on computers?
questions.explanation: In Image B, we observe two people sitting across from each other at a desk, each working on a computer. This can be concluded from the presence of computer monitors in front of both individuals, indicating their engagement in computer work at a shared desk.

questions.question: Is the desk supported by chairs on both sides, and are both individuals seated?
questions.explanation: The visual in Image B shows a desk with one chair on each side, occupied by two seated individuals. The logic here is based on the arrangement around the desk, which signifies that chairs are available, and individuals are using them.

questions.question: Are there two framed portraits hanging on the wall behind the individual on the left?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there appear to be two framed portraits on the wall next to the left-seated individual. The frames are visible above the individual, and the position suggests they are part of the wall decor.

questions.question: Are there potted plants placed on either side of the desk?
questions.explanation: Image B displays potted plants strategically positioned on both sides of the desk, one to the left of the left individual and another to the right of the right individual, both on the floor, enhancing aesthetics.

questions.question: Are both individuals wearing orange sweaters over collared shirts and black pants?
questions.explanation: In Image B, each individual is depicted wearing an orange sweater over a collared shirt, paired with black pants. This is inferred from the clothing contrast between the bright pullover, visible collars, and dark lower attire.
